code: import React from'react';import{useParams,Link}from'react-router-dom';import hotels from'../data';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HotelDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const hotel=hotels.find(hotel=>hotel.id===parseInt(id));if(!hotel){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Hotel not found"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"hotel-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Back to list"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:hotel.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:hotel.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:hotel.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:hotel.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:hotel.rating}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:hotel.image,alt:hotel.name})]});};export default HotelDetail;
